biotools.summary: Consistency-regularized region-growing network (CRGNet) for semantic segmentation of VHR remote sensing images using point-level annotations. The key idea of CRGNet is to iteratively select unlabeled pixels with high confidence to expand the annotated area from the original sparse points

bioschemas.name: CRGNet
bioschemas.summary: Consistency-regularized region-growing network (CRGNet) for semantic segmentation of VHR remote sensing images using point-level annotations.
